mapper.select: WITH NAME AS ( SELECT PROD_BUYER , COUNT(PROD_ID) PROD_COUNT FROM PROD GROUP BY PROD_BUYER ), BUYER_VIEW AS( SELECT * FROM BUYER INNER JOIN LPROD ON (BUYER_LGU = LPROD_GU) ) SELECT BUYER_ID , BUYER_NAME , BUYER_LGU , BUYER_ADD1 , BUYER_CHARGER , BUYER_COMTEL , LPROD_NM , NVL(PROD_COUNT,0) PROD_COUNT FROM BUYER_VIEW LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD_VIEW ON (BUYER_ID = PROD_BUYER)

SELECT BUYER_ID , BUYER_NAME , BUYER_LGU , BUYER_ADD1 , BUYER_CHARGER , BUYER_COMTEL , LPROD_NM , PROD_NAME , PROD_COST , PROD_PRICE , PROD_MILEAGE FROM BUYER INNER JOIN LPROD ON (BUYER_LGU = LPROD_GU) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD ON (BUYER_ID = PROD_BUYER) WHERE BUYER_ID = #{buyerId}
